summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in `frontend/src/index.css` by changing the `body` background sizing from `contain` to `background-size: 100% auto` while keeping `background-repeat: no-repeat` and using `image-set` URLs for the background images. hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include adding user-facing controls; while this overlay is not a control, it is still a significant visual feature not requested as part of adjusting background-size.
Not mentioned in requirements or acceptance criteria; changes scrolling/rendering behavior beyond background-size testing.
